item.title: [sld] Shadowborn Apostle
item.description:
Creature — Human Cleric

A deck can have any number of cards named Shadowborn Apostle.

{B}, Sacrifice six creatures named Shadowborn Apostle: Search your library for a Demon creature card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

item.title: [sir] Ghoulcaller's Accomplice
item.description:
Creature — Human Rogue

{3}{B}, Exile Ghoulcaller's Accomplice from your graveyard: Create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token. Activate only as a sorcery.

item.title: [sir] Geralf's Masterpiece
item.description:
Creature — Zombie Horror

Flying

Geralf's Masterpiece gets -1/-1 for each card in your hand.

{3}{U}, Discard three cards: Return Geralf's Masterpiece from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.

item.title: [sir] Geist of the Archives
item.description:
Creature — Spirit

Defender

At the beginning of your upkeep, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

item.title: [sir] Geier Reach Sanitarium
item.description:
Legendary Land

{T}: Add {C}.

{2}, {T}: Each player draws a card, then discards a card.

item.title: [sir] Gavony Unhallowed
item.description:
Creature — Zombie

Whenever another creature you control dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Gavony Unhallowed.

item.title: [sir] Game Trail
item.description:
Land

As Game Trail enters the battlefield, you may reveal a Mountain or Forest card from your hand. If you don't, Game Trail enters the battlefield tapped.

{T}: Add {R} or {G}.

item.title: [sir] Galvanic Bombardment
item.description:
Instant

Galvanic Bombardment deals X damage to target creature, where X is 2 plus the number of cards named Galvanic Bombardment in your graveyard.

item.title: [sir] Furyblade Vampire
item.description:
Creature — Vampire Berserker

Trample

At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may discard a card. If you do, Furyblade Vampire gets +3/+0 until end of turn.

item.title: [sir] Foul Orchard
item.description:
Land

Foul Orchard enters the battlefield tapped.

{T}: Add {B} or {G}.

item.title: [sir] Fortified Village
item.description:
Land

As Fortified Village enters the battlefield, you may reveal a Forest or Plains card from your hand. If you don't, Fortified Village enters the battlefield tapped.

{T}: Add {G} or {W}.

item.title: [sir] Forsaken Sanctuary
item.description:
Land

Forsaken Sanctuary enters the battlefield tapped.

{T}: Add {W} or {B}.

item.title: [sir] Forgotten Creation
item.description:
Creature — Zombie Horror

Skulk (This creature can't be blocked by creatures with greater power.)

At the beginning of your upkeep, you may discard all the cards in your hand. If you do, draw that many cards.

item.title: [sir] Foreboding Ruins
item.description:
Land

As Foreboding Ruins enters the battlefield, you may reveal a Swamp or Mountain card from your hand. If you don't, Foreboding Ruins enters the battlefield tapped.

{T}: Add {B} or {R}.

item.title: [sir] Fogwalker
item.description:
Creature — Spirit

Skulk (This creature can't be blocked by creatures with greater power.)

When Fogwalker enters the battlefield, target creature an opponent controls doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

item.title: [sir] Fleeting Memories
item.description:
Enchantment

When Fleeting Memories enters the battlefield, investigate. (Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

Whenever you sacrifice a Clue, target player mills three cards.

item.title: [sir] Flameblade Angel
item.description:
Creature — Angel

Flying

Whenever a source an opponent controls deals damage to you or a permanent you control, you may have Flameblade Angel deal 1 damage to that source's controller.

item.title: [sir] Fiery Temper
item.description:
Instant

Fiery Temper deals 3 damage to any target.

Madness {R} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

item.title: [sir] Fiend Binder
item.description:
Creature — Human Soldier

Whenever Fiend Binder attacks, tap target creature defending player controls.

item.title: [sir] Field Creeper
item.description: Artifact Creature — Scarecrow

item.title: [sir] Fevered Visions
item.description:
Enchantment

At the beginning of each player's end step, that player draws a card. If the player is your opponent and has four or more cards in hand, Fevered Visions deals 2 damage to that player.

item.title: [sir] Falkenrath Gorger
item.description:
Creature — Vampire Berserker

Each Vampire creature card you own that isn't on the battlefield has madness. The madness cost is equal to its mana cost. (If you discard a card with madness, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

item.title: [sir] Faith Unbroken
item.description:
Enchantment — Aura

Enchant creature you control

When Faith Unbroken enters the battlefield, exile target creature an opponent controls until Faith Unbroken leaves the battlefield.

Enchanted creature gets +2/+2.

item.title: [sir] Faithbearer Paladin
item.description:
Creature — Human Knight

Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)

item.title: [sir] Exultant Cultist
item.description:
Creature — Human Wizard

When Exultant Cultist dies, draw a card.

item.title: [sir] Explosive Apparatus
item.description:
Artifact

{3}, {T}, Sacrifice Explosive Apparatus: It deals 2 damage to any target.

item.title: [sir] Ever After
item.description:
Sorcery

Return up to two target creature cards from your graveyard to the battlefield. Each of those creatures is a black Zombie in addition to its other colors and types. Put Ever After on the bottom of its owner's library.

item.title: [sir] Eternal Scourge
item.description:
Creature — Eldrazi Horror

You may cast Eternal Scourge from exile.

When Eternal Scourge becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, exile Eternal Scourge.

item.title: [sir] Essence Flux
item.description:
Instant

Exile target creature you control, then return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control. If it's a Spirit, put a +1/+1 counter on it.

item.title: [sir] Erdwal Illuminator
item.description:
Creature — Spirit

Flying

Whenever you investigate for the first time each turn, investigate an additional time.

item.title: [sir] Epitaph Golem
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Golem

{2}: Put target card from your graveyard on the bottom of your library.

item.title: [sir] Epiphany at the Drownyard
item.description:
Instant

Reveal the top X plus one cards of your library and separate them into two piles. An opponent chooses one of those piles. Put that pile into your hand and the other into your graveyard.

item.title: [sir] Emrakul, the Promised End
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Eldrazi

This spell costs {1} less to cast for each card type among cards in your graveyard.

When you cast this spell, you gain control of target opponent during that player's next turn. After that turn, that player takes an extra turn.

Flying, trample, protection from instants

item.title: [sir] Ember-Eye Wolf
item.description:
Creature — Wolf

Haste

{1}{R}: Ember-Eye Wolf gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

item.title: [sir] Eldritch Evolution
item.description:
Sorcery

As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.

Search your library for a creature card with mana value X or less, where X is 2 plus the sacrificed creature's mana value. Put that card onto the battlefield, then shuffle. Exile Eldritch Evolution.

item.title: [sir] Elder Deep-Fiend
item.description:
Creature — Eldrazi Octopus

Flash

Emerge {5}{U}{U} (You may cast this spell by sacrificing a creature and paying the emerge cost reduced by that creature's mana value.)

When you cast this spell, tap up to four target permanents.

item.title: [sir] Dusk Feaster
item.description:
Creature — Vampire

Delirium — This spell costs {2} less to cast if there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard.

Flying

item.title: [sir] Drunau Corpse Trawler
item.description:
Creature — Zombie

When Drunau Corpse Trawler enters the battlefield, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.

{2}{B}: Target Zombie gains deathtouch until end of turn.

item.title: [sir] Drownyard Explorers
item.description:
Creature — Human Wizard

When Drownyard Explorers enters the battlefield, investigate. (Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

item.title: [sir] Drownyard Behemoth
item.description:
Creature — Eldrazi Crab

Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)

Emerge {7}{U} (You may cast this spell by sacrificing a creature and paying the emerge cost reduced by that creature's mana value.)

Drownyard Behemoth has hexproof as long as it entered the battlefield this turn.

item.title: [sir] Drogskol Shieldmate
item.description:
Creature — Spirit Soldier

Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)

When Drogskol Shieldmate enters the battlefield, other creatures you control get +0/+1 until end of turn.

item.title: [sir] Drag Under
item.description:
Sorcery

Return target creature to its owner's hand.

Draw a card.

item.title: [sir] Distended Mindbender
item.description:
Creature — Eldrazi Insect

Emerge {5}{B}{B} (You may cast this spell by sacrificing a creature and paying the emerge cost reduced by that creature's mana value.)

When you cast this spell, target opponent reveals their hand. You choose from it a nonland card with mana value 3 or less and a card with mana value 4 or greater. That player discards those cards.

item.title: [sir] Diregraf Colossus
item.description:
Creature — Zombie Giant

Diregraf Colossus enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each Zombie card in your graveyard.

Whenever you cast a Zombie spell, create a tapped 2/2 black Zombie creature token.

item.title: [sir] Devilthorn Fox
item.description: Creature — Fox

item.title: [sir] Devils' Playground
item.description:
Sorcery

Create four 1/1 red Devil creature tokens. They have "When this creature dies, it deals 1 damage to any target."

item.title: [sir] Descend upon the Sinful
item.description:
Sorcery

Exile all creatures.

Delirium — Create a 4/4 white Angel creature token with flying if there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard.

item.title: [sir] Deranged Whelp
item.description:
Creature — Wolf

Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

item.title: [sir] Deny Existence
item.description:
Instant

Counter target creature spell. If that spell is countered this way, exile it instead of putting it into its owner's graveyard.

item.title: [sir] Declaration in Stone
item.description:
Sorcery

Exile target creature and all other creatures its controller controls with the same name as that creature. That player investigates for each nontoken creature exiled this way.
